layer.title: Overarching goals
layer.annotation: Goal: Build and test GNU's latest source distribution of the `bc` command-line calculator. Tool: Alpine Linux Subtool: BusyBox shell Result: successResult
Goal: Dump this shell's history to the terminal and a file at the path "/herstory" Tool: Alpine Linux. Subtool: Busybox shell Result: successResult

layer.title: Subgoals
layer.annotation: Goal: Obtain a buildable source distribution of GNU `bc`. Tool: The `cd` builtin included in the BusyBox multi-call binary's shell interpreter Tool: GNU `wget` Tool: The `tar` unarchiver included in the BusyBox multi-call binary Result: successResult

Goal: Configure the downloaded source distribution of GNU `bc` for building, installing dependencies as needed. Tool: BusyBox's shell interpreter running the `configure` shell script included with the `bc` source distribution Tool: The `setup-apkrepos` shell script included with Alpine Linux Tool: Alpine's `apk` package manager Tool: The `vi` command built into the BusyBox multi-call binary Result: successResult
Goal: Build and install GNU `bc` from the freshly-configured source distribution. Tool: GNU `make` Tool: Alpine's `apk` package manager Result: successResult
Goal: Test that the `bc` from the source distribution is installed correctly. Tool: GNU `bc` Tool: `which` built into the BusyBox multi-call binary Result: successResult

layer.title: Individual commands
layer.annotation: Goal: Change working directories to the current shell account's `HOME`. Tool: The `cd` builtin included with the BusyBox multi-call binary's shell interpreter. Result: successResult

Goal: Download the v1.08.1 source distribution of the GNU `bc` calculator. Tool: GNU `wget` Mistakes: The command line `setup-apk` (an incomplete `setup-apkrepos` invocation) is typed before the operator changes their mind. Result: successResult

Goal: Extract the newly-downloaded xz-compressed source distribution tarball. Tool: `tar` included with the BusyBox multi-call binary Mistakes: A `cd` command line is typed by mistake and then erased by the operator. Result: successResult

Goal: Change working directories to the root of the newly-extracted `bc` source distribution. Tool: The `cd` builtin too the shell interpreter included with the BusyBox multi-call binary Result: successResult
Goal: List the contents of the current working directory (the root of the extracted `bc` source distribution). Tool: The `ls` tool included with the BusyBox multi-call binary Result: successResult

Goal: Configure the downloaded `bc` source distribution for building. Tool: The `configure` script included with the source distribution (evaluated by the BusyBox shell interpreter) Discoveries: A working C compiler is required to build GNU `bc`. Result: successFailure

Goal: Pick an Alpine mirror for the `apk` package manager to use, and enable the community repository. Tools: Busybox's built-in Borne shell interpreter runs Alpine's `setup-apkrepos` script. Result: successResult

Goal: Configure the downloaded `bc` source distribution for building. Tool: The `configure` script included with the source distribution (evaluated by the BusyBox shell interpreter) Mistakes: Operator forgets to install the C compiler before re-running `configure`. Discoveries: A working C compiler is still required to build GNU `bc`. Result: successFailure
Goal: Install the GNU Compiler Collection package from Alpine's archives. Tool: The `add` subcommand of the `apk` package manager included with Alpine. Result: successResult

Goal: Configure the downloaded `bc` source distribution for building. Tool: The `configure` script included with the source distribution (evaluated by the BusyBox shell interpreter) Discovery: After installing the `gcc` package, `configure` still fails to detect a working C compiler. Result: successFailure

Goal: Inspect configure's `config.log` to see what went wrong. Tool: The `vi` tool included with the BusyBox multi-call binary Discovery: The header files for the system's musl libC were not included in the previously-installed `gcc` package. Result: successResult
Goal: Install the missing musl standard C development headers. Tool: The `add` subcommand of Alpine's `apk` package manager. Result: successResult

Goal: Configure the downloaded `bc` source distribution for building. Tool: The `configure` script included with the source distribution (evaluated by the BusyBox shell interpreter) Discovery: GNU `make` required to build `bc`. Result: successFailure
Goal: Install the Alpine package for the GNU Make program. Tool: The `add` subcommand belonging to Alpine's `apk` packager. Result: successResult

Goal: Configure the downloaded `bc` source distribution for building. Tool: The `configure` script included with the source distribution (evaluated by the BusyBox shell interpreter) Result: successResult
Goal: Build the GNU `bc` source distribution Tool: GNU `make` Discovery: The `texinfo` package's `makeinfo` program is required to finish building `bc`. Result: successFailure
Goal: Install Alpine's binary `texinfo` package from their archive servers. Tool: The `add` subcommand` of Alpine's `apk` package manager. Result: successResult
Goal: Build the GNU `bc` source distribution Tool: GNU `make` Result: successResult
Goal: Install the built `bc` software to the `configure`d `PREFIX`. Tool: The `install` target in `bc`'s makefile, invoked via the `make` command Result: successResult

Goal: Verify that the version of the installed `bc` runs from the shell's `PATH` Tool: The newly-installed `bc`, invoked with its `--version` flag Mistake: A stray `w` is typed and then erased before typing the eventual command line. Result: successResult

Goal: Verify that the `bc` program that was just run from the shell's `PATH` got installed to the correct `PREFIX`. Tool: The `which` tool included with the BusyBox multi-call binary Result: successResult
Goal: Test `bc` by running commands in its interactive REPL shell. Tool: GNU `bc` Result: successResult
Goal: Dump this shell's history to the terminal and a file at the path "/herstory" Tool: The `history` command built into the BusyBox shell interpreter Result: successResult

layer.title: bc interactive REPL
layer.annotation: Goal: Add `2` and `2` together Tool: `bc`'s `+` operator. Result: successResult

Goal: Exit the `bc` interactive REPL. Tool: The EOF escape sequence is issued by pressing `Ctrl`+`d` on the keyboard. Mistakes: Operator types the number `4` before deciding to exit the calculator instead. Result: successResult
